reviewText: I am way behind on my reading and have not had a chance to even look at this one yet
I was hoping for more of the roughing it book to be presented in the movie.  The movie only took one section of the book, now I have to re-read the book.
I love anything that Mark Twain wrote and happy to have this wonderful story beautifully portrayed in this video.
I bought this for a gift for a sick friend. He loves it!
Love and miss James Garner!  Recommend this seller.
James Garner was a wonderful actor.  He is greatly missed.

I've been working my way through his movies since he died last year. This DVD has a big picture of him on the cover and his name in large letters.

He is on-screen for three minutes.

Otherwise, these are three so-so adaptations from the early 70s. Could be family viewing for small children.
Good adaptation of this classic author's work.
You can't go wrong with an excellent author.
